testcase.name: Refund Policy Page > should render the page with non-empty content
Refund Policy Page > should display last updated date
Refund Policy Page > should contain all major sections
Refund Policy Page > should contain substantial text content
Refund Policy Page > should have proper page structure with container and article
Refund Policy Page > should contain contact email link
Refund Policy Page > should use consistent styling with other legal pages
Footer Component > should display all legal navigation links
Footer Component > should have correct href attributes for legal links
Footer Component > should display app logo and name
Footer Component > should display Legal section heading
Footer Component > should display Support section with contact email
Footer Component > should display copyright text with current year
Footer Component > should apply correct CSS classes for styling
Footer Component > should have proper link hover styles
Footer Component > Accessibility > should have semantic footer element
Footer Component > Accessibility > should have proper heading hierarchy
Footer Component > Accessibility > should have accessible navigation for legal links
Privacy Policy Page > should render the page with non-empty content
Privacy Policy Page > should display last updated date
Privacy Policy Page > should contain all major sections
Privacy Policy Page > should contain substantial text content
Privacy Policy Page > should have proper page structure with container and article
Privacy Policy Page > should contain contact email link
Landing Page > Unauthenticated State > should display 'Get Started Now' button that triggers sign in
Landing Page > Unauthenticated State > should display 'Start Free Trial' button in final CTA section
Landing Page > Unauthenticated State > should display 'Get Started' button in pricing section
Landing Page > Unauthenticated State > should not display authenticated-only content
Landing Page > Authenticated State > should currently still show 'Get Started Now' button (not yet implemented to show 'Go to Dashboard')
Landing Page > Authenticated State > should currently still show sign-in button instead of 'Go to Dashboard' (not yet implemented)
Landing Page > Authenticated State > should display 'Sign in to start' button in pricing section when authenticated
Landing Page > Authenticated State > FUTURE: should display 'Go to Dashboard' button in hero section when authenticated
Landing Page > Authenticated State > FUTURE: should display 'Go to Dashboard' button in final CTA when authenticated
Landing Page > Common Elements > should always display Contact Sales button
Landing Page > Common Elements > should display upgrade buttons in pricing section
Landing Page > Common Elements > should display main heading with business tagline
Landing Page > Common Elements > should display feature sections
Terms of Service Page > should render the page with non-empty content
Terms of Service Page > should display last updated date
Terms of Service Page > should contain all major sections
Terms of Service Page > should contain substantial text content
Terms of Service Page > should have proper page structure with container and article
Terms of Service Page > should contain contact email link
Header Component > Unauthenticated State > should display Sign In and Sign Up buttons when user is not authenticated
Header Component > Unauthenticated State > should call signIn when Sign In button is clicked
Header Component > Unauthenticated State > should call signIn when Sign Up button is clicked
Header Component > Unauthenticated State > should not show navigation links when unauthenticated
Header Component > Unauthenticated State > should show mobile menu with Sign In/Sign Up when hamburger menu is clicked
Header Component > Authenticated State > should display Dashboard button when user is authenticated
Header Component > Authenticated State > should display credits when user is authenticated
Header Component > Authenticated State > should display navigation links when user is authenticated
Header Component > Authenticated State > should show mobile menu with authenticated content when hamburger menu is clicked
Header Component > Authenticated State > should call signOut when Sign Out button in mobile menu is clicked
Header Component > Mobile Menu Toggle > should toggle mobile menu visibility when hamburger button is clicked
